descriptor.name: KFC
descriptor.short_desc:
KFC is a world-famous American fast food restaurant chain with over 24,000 outlets in more than 150 countries and territories around the globe. Though the brand is originated in Louisville, Kentucky, KFC has become a household name among chicken lovers worldwide. Its diverse menu offers chicken buckets, tenders, sandwiches, fried chicken, sides, sauces, desserts, drinks, and more.

In short, if you want to have a blast with your friend, KFC restaurant is the perfect place for you. The thrill of finger-licking chicken pieces and other dishes is going to spruce up your day.

With amazing deals running on their menu, KFC makes their chicken more enjoyable and economical by offering a range of E-Gift Cards. As the KFC menu is so rich and palatable, its Gift Cards also make the perfect gift that you can think about giving to especially those who love chicken. With Gift cards, you can give your loved ones, friends, and colleagues the freedom to choose their favorite dishes.

Is your mouth watering with just the discussion of juicy, luscious, and tender chicken from KFC? Get a gift card online and get more food to savor on the same amount.

descriptor.name: Puma
descriptor.short_desc:
1. Once a product has been ordered, any further deviations can happen only before 5 days of the proposed delivery. Deviations from or subsequent amendments or additions to such order must be in writing. Any order or deviation by Phone shall be possible only if the same is followed by a written confirmation.
  2. Subject to raising of a proper order the product shall be delivered at the address indicated by a third party courier agency. The customer herein gives an absolute authorization in favour of such third party agency to deliver the product ordered. As the products are to be delivered by a third party courier Agency, PSIPL shall not be responsible for any late delivery or any non-delivery because of the in correct address.

descriptor.name: Vaango
descriptor.short_desc: "Vaango is the most sought-after name among South Indian food lovers. Vaango means “come in” in Tamil - a classic way to welcome guests.
descriptor.long_desc: "Vaango is the most sought-after name among South Indian food lovers. Vaango means “come in” in Tamil - a classic way to welcome guests. It offers a modern and contemporary yet authentic South Indian dining experience while ensuring home-like comfort. This South Indian restaurant chain was launched by Devyani International Limited - the largest franchisee of Yum Brands in India. Vaango offers the traditional South Indian delicacies loved by people of all ages. So, hands down, Vaango is clearly a one-stop destination for all people who love eating out but want good value. A highly desirable, world-class South Indian Pure Veg QSR (Quick Service Restaurant) chain, Vaango has created a distinct name for its inviting ambiance. Consequently, when it’s about enjoying the Authentic Flavors of South India, Vaango is the one name that comes to our mind. When you order your South Indian Food use Gift Card powered by Valuedesign. This is gonna help you save some money, as the vouchers from Valuedesign are avail
